name: PeopleSoft: Avoid unused Page
output: List all the unreferenced PeopleSoft Page
rationale: Dead code must be avoided, it makes source code less readable, and increases the maintenance cost.
remediation: Check that the artefacts are truly necessary, supress them if they are not needed

qualityStandards.name: Dead code
qualityStandards.description: Number of instances where a function or method is unreferenced by any other code item in the application (the application determines the scope of the search for code items that could call a function or method element)

qualityStandards.name: Dead Code
qualityStandards.description: The software contains dead code, which can never be executed.
